Question
========

Which of the below is the null hypothesis for a one-way between-subjects ANOVA?
  
Answerlist
----------
* $H_{0}:  \mu_{1} \neq \mu_{2} = ... =  \mu_{k}$
* $H_{0}:  \mu_{1} \neq \mu_{2} \neq ... =  \mu_{k}$
* $H_{0}:  \mu_{1} = \mu_{2} = ... =  \mu_{k}$
* $H_{0}:  \mu_{1} = \mu_{2} \neq ... =  \mu_{k}$

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
